UI::ResizeDialog

Detailed Description

The ResizeDialog class displays a small dialog box to prompt the user for an amount to resize the image loaded into the editor.

Parameters:
ResizeLevel Contains the amount of resize the user specifies.

Once the user hits the "Resize Image" button, this grabs the value from the dialog box.
